summoning_condition.en: If a player has a Trap Card in their Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

requirement.en: Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 "Jinzo" from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, you can look at all face-down cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone, then return them to their original positions. If you do, destroy all Trap Cards among them.
